course_title: Acute and Chronic Care I Practicum
class_notes: This class is for DABSN Semester 1 students only. SESSION TWO: Mar. 14-May 6. On Campus Intensives: TBD.
course_description: The clinical component focuses on planning and implementing care for adults/older adult with alterations in health. Focus is on developing competency in basic nursing skills and related documentation. Evidenced based practice, quality and safety, and cultural awareness are emphasized.
sections: Class Nbr: 3847, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: A. Haynes Ferere, Status: Open
